dialog.bernina1: <%s> Have you heard of the Elna fashion brand? My sister started that company!
dialog.bernina2: <%s> Now you look like a new hat would be just the thing to brighten up your day!
dialog.jessHi1: <%s> The welcome center is getting more and more cozy everyday!  I love the updates you made to the place!
dialog.jessHi4: <%s> Oh oh! I think I just thought of another angle to advertize the holiday getaway package!
dialog.pamela1: <%s> Hello %s have you discovered any interesting dishes recently?
dialog.pamela2: <%s> I wonder if my children back home would enjoy pork carrot wontons? Oh hello %s, how have you been?
dialog.pamela3: <%s> The place you've build for me is amazing! I love being able to cook while on my holiday!
dialog.pamela4: <%s> Do you need any common cooking ingredients?  I have plenty for sale!
dialog.ren2: <%s> Take good care of your tools
dialog.sam1: <%s> Do you need any fishing equipment?  I've got you covered!
dialog.sam2: <%s> I've got to say it's very refreshing to sell sushi in this area
dialog.sam3: <%s> Have you caught anything interesting while fishing lately?
